transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. You can ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🛑 I stop at designated places.
🎫 You might need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I float on water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a rowboat.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in place.
🚢 You can take a vacation on me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.
🔔 I often have a bell.
🚲 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I travel on rails and carry many people from city to city. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
⏱️ I run on a schedule.
💺 You sit in a car when you ride me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
💺 You need a seatbelt when riding me.
✈️ I take off from an airport.

transport.question: I can only carry 1 or 2 people. I have two wheels and an engine, and I am faster than a bicycle. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You need a helmet to ride me.
⛽ I need fuel to work.
🏍️ I am smaller than a car.

transport.question: I travel underground and carry many people quickly through a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I am also called a subway.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🌃 I am a good way to avoid traffic.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that carries goods, and sometimes people, on a flat, open 'bed'. What am I?

hints.text: 🛻 I am smaller than a semi-trailer.
🚜 I am often used for work.
🛣️ I am commonly seen on roads and farms.

transport.question: I'm a flying machine with spinning blades on top. I can hover in one place. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I don't need a runway to take off.
🚑 I'm often used for rescue missions.
🚨 I am good for traveling short distances.

transport.question: I carry cars across the water. I have a wide, flat deck. What am I?

hints.text: 🛥️ I am a type of boat.
🌊 I am used for short journeys over water.
⚓ I often travel back and forth regularly.

plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear a green coat, but have no arms. I like the sun and rain, but can't swim. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow from a tiny seed.
🌳 I give shade on a sunny day.
💧 I need water to live.

plant.question: I am a plant that's red, juicy, and round. I grow on a vine and am tasty all around. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I like warm weather.
🥪 People put me on sandwiches.
🔴 My color is like a fire truck.

plant.question: I have a head and a stem, but no face. I smell sweet and can be many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.
🐝 Bees love me.
🌷 I grow in gardens.

plant.question: I am tall and green, with needles instead of leaves. You decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year round.
🎁 Presents are often placed under me.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am a long, orange vegetable, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me.
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.
🐰 I'm often orange, but can also be other colours.

plant.question: I have a rough brown skin and a sweet white inside. Monkeys love to eat me, but I grow on a tall plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in tropical climates.
😋 I can be used in smoothies.
🍌 Monkeys love them

plant.question: I have sharp needles, but I'm not a pine tree. I live in the desert and can store lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I thrive in dry environments.
🏜️ You can find me in the desert.
☀️ I can be dangerous to touch.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when it's hot. People love to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I'm often buttery and salty.
🌽 I start as a kernel.
🎥 I'm a popular snack during movies.

plant.question: I'm a climbing plant that produces a big, round fruit. I'm green on the outside and red on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm very refreshing on a hot day.
🏖️ I'm often eaten during the summer.
🌱 I grow on vines.

plant.question: I am a plant that lives in the water and has large, round leaves that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs love to hang out on me.
🌸 I can have beautiful flowers.
🏞️ I live in ponds and lakes.
